 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: IT-Drifttekniker till Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset
description:
Vill du arbeta i en tekniskt avancerad miljö där stabil drift är avgörande för samhällsviktig verksamhet? Vi söker nu en drifttekniker till Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset som vill bidra till en säker och modern IT-miljö inom vården. Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**Du erbjuds**
* Ett arbete med moderna teknologier och system som stödjer en samhällsviktig verksamhet
* Att bli en del av ett kompetent och engagerat IT-team där vi hjälps åt, lär av varandra och arbetar tillsammans för att vården ska kunna utföras utan avbrott
* En nyckelroll i att säkerställa tillgänglighet, pålitlighet och säkerhet i vårdens kritiska IT-system


 Självklart får du också ta del av våra generella förmåner som Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset erbjuder dig.
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 I rollen som IT-drifttekniker blir du en del av vårt IT-team och ansvarar för den dagliga driften, underhållet och vidareutvecklingen av vår server- och systemmiljö med särskilt fokus på Windowsservrar och Linux.
   

  

 Tjänsten innebär ett varierat arbete där du kombinerar operativa driftuppgifter med felsökning, förbättringsarbete och teknisk utveckling. Du arbetar nära både kollegor inom IT och andra delar av verksamheten.
   

  

 Som drifttekniker har du en central funktion i att säkerställa att våra system och tjänster fungerar optimalt. Du övervakar miljöer, identifierar potentiella problem innan de påverkar verksamheten och agerar snabbt och metodiskt vid incidenter.
   

  

 I vår IT-miljö hanterar du bland annat Windowsbaserade serverlösningar, Linuxservrar, virtualiseringsplattformar och centrala infrastrukturtjänster. Du arbetar med installation, konfiguration och underhåll av servrar och system, samt ansvarar för uppdateringar, patchning och säkerhetsrelaterade åtgärder. En viktig del av arbetet är även felsökning och problemlösning där du analyserar loggar, prestanda och systembeteenden.
   

  

 Utöver det löpande driftarbetet deltar du aktivt i förbättrings- och utvecklingsinitiativ. Det kan handla om att effektivisera processer, bidra till automatisering, stärka säkerheten eller förbättra systemens prestanda och tillförlitlighet. Rollen erbjuder därför goda möjligheter att både påverka och utvecklas tekniskt.
   

  

 Vi arbetar i en miljö där kvalitet, samarbete och ansvarstagande är viktiga värderingar. Du blir en del av ett team där kunskapsdelning och tekniskt engagemang uppmuntras, och där du får möjlighet att arbeta med moderna tekniska lösningar i en stabil och professionell IT-verksamhet
   

  

**Vi söker dig som**
* har ett starkt intresse för IT-drift och förvaltning och som trivs i en roll där du får ta ett helhetsansvar för en eller flera IT-tjänster
* har förmågan att se både verksamhetens behov och de tekniska förutsättningarna, och kan omsätta detta i tydliga prioriteringar som skapar stabilitet och långsiktigt värde
* är strukturerad, ansvarstagande och van vid att arbeta med många intressenter samtidigt
* genom god kommunikationsförmåga kan fungera som en naturlig länk mellan verksamhet, driftteam, leverantörer och andra tekniska funktioner
* är bekväm med att fatta beslut, även när alla svar inte är givna, och har ett lösningsorienterat förhållningssätt vid incidenter och förbättringsarbete.


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet för rollen.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
**Krav**
* Högskoleutbildning, yrkeshögskoleutbildning eller eftergymnasial utbildning inom för befattningen relevanta områden
* God kännedom om systemarkitektur och nätverksarkitektur
* God kunskap inom systemadministration, du behärskar både Windows Server OS samt Linux (RHEL, Ubuntu etc). Utan problem skriver du skript i Powershell eller Bash/Shell, Perl eller liknande på linuxplattform
* God kännedom kring databaser, både traditionella relationsdatabaser såsom MySQL och MS SQL Server men även NoSQL
* God kunskap om övervakningssystem såsom Zabbix eller liknande plattformar


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av molntjänster (t.ex. Azure, AWS)
* Kunskap inom virtualisering
* Erfarenhet av automatisering / scripting
* Erfarenhet av ITIL eller liknande arbetssätt.


**Om rekryteringsprocessen**
 Urval och intervjuer kan komma att ske löpande under ansökningstiden.
   

  

 I samband med din ansökan behöver du bifoga CV. Istället för ett personligt brev ber vi dig besvara urvalsfrågor samt kort motivera varför du passar för rollen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan - Tillsammans är vi Karolinska!
   

  

 Inför tillsättning av befattning som innefattar vård av barn och ungdom, kontrolleras den som erbjuds tjänsten mot misstanke- och belastningsregistret. Här kan du läsa mer om rekryteringsprocessen och om vilka kontroller som utförs på Karolinska.
   

  

 Som anställd på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset kan du komma att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om vad det innebär här.
   

  

 Om du är eller tidigare har varit anställd i Region Stockholm kommer vi att ta interna referenser från din nuvarande eller tidigare chef, om du blir aktuell för anställning.
   

  

 För tillsvidaretjänster kan provanställning komma att tillämpas.
   

  

**Om Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset**
 Vi på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset är stolta över att vi är ett av världens främsta universitetssjukhus. Förutom vårt särskilda ansvar för den högspecialiserade vården i Stockholmsregionen är huvuduppdraget att tillsammans med Karolinska Institutet utbilda framtidens vårdanställda och bedriva världsledande forskning samtidigt som vi fortsätter vårt arbete med att utveckla vården för patientens bästa. Vi arbetar inom en rad olika områden och professioner.
   

  

 Vår vision - Vi ska bota och lindra imorgon det ingen kan bota och lindra idag.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om oss på karolinska.se och följ oss på sociala medier!
   

  

**Att söka jobb i Region Stockholm**
 Vi eftersträvar jämställdhet och jämlikhet på vår arbetsplats och ser gärna sökande med olika bakgrund och förutsättningar.
   

  

 Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via detta system. Ansök genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök”. Ansökningar per brev eller e-post beaktas inte. Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.
   

  

 Vårt rekryteringssystem kan inte hantera anonyma ansökningar eller sökande med skyddade personuppgifter. Om du har skyddade personuppgifter ber vi dig att kontakta den kontaktpersonen som finns angiven i annonsen. Din ansökan kommer då att hanteras utanför rekryteringssystemet. Du bör även vara försiktig med vilken information du lämnar i din ansökan och endast ta med information som är relevant för den aktuella befattningen.
   

  

 Region Stockholm ansvarar för hälso- och sjukvård, kollektivtrafik, regional utveckling och bidrar till kulturlivet. Varje dag, dygnet runt. I landets snabbaste växande region. Tillsammans skapar vi Europas attraktivaste storstadsregion.
   

  

 Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss i Region Stockholm (öppnas i nytt fönster)
   

  

 Fackliga representanter
   

  

 Namn
   

  

 Vision sektion Karolinska
   

  

 Telefon
   

  

 vision.karolinska@regionstockholm.se

title: Director, IT Transformation Consulting, Defense
description:
**Director / Senior Director – IT Consulting (Defence Sector)**
**Location: Sweden | Hybrid Work Model**
 Are you a senior leader with deep roots in the Swedish defence or military sector? Have you led strategic technology initiatives, advised top decision-makers, or driven transformation within Försvarsmakten, FMV, FRA, or similar organizations? If you're now curious about how your expertise could shape the future of defense capabilities, Gartner Consulting in the Nordics would like to meet you.
   

  

**Why Gartner Consulting?**
 At Gartner, we help governments and public sector organizations stay ahead of the curve—leveraging technology to deliver real impact. Backed by Gartner’s world-class Business & Technology Insights, our consultants provide independent, data-driven advice that improves citizen outcomes, optimizes taxpayer value, and enhances operational efficiency.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 We’re expanding our Strategy & Technology Consulting team in Stockholm and are looking for a visionary leader with deep defense/military experience.
   

  

 Whether you’ve worked in a consultative role within the Swedish Armed Forces or have led major IT transformations in a defense ministry or agency (internally or representing a consulting firm), your insights are invaluable and we would like to hear from you.
   

  

 This role is ideal for someone who thrives at the intersection of strategy, technology, and leadership—and is ready to bring that experience into a dynamic, open and inclusive consulting environment.
   

  

 If you feel that you fit some of the criteria (even if not all), we encourage you to get in touch - we are passionate about bringing talent from a wide range of backgrounds.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Advise senior leaders in defense and military organizations on technology strategy and innovation.
* Deliver insights on operating models, organizational design, digital transformation, and governance.
* Support decision-making with data-driven analysis, helping clients optimize IT investments and drive mission success.
* Lead engagements across areas such as cloud transformation, applications modernization, sourcing strategy, and program assurance.


**What We’re Looking For**
 We’re seeking candidates who can operate at the highest strategic level. You may have:
   

  

* Extensive experience in technology-led transformation within the Swedish defense ecosystem (e.g., Försvarsmakten, FMV, FRA, Fortifikationsverket).
* A strong understanding of strategic planning, IT governance, and digital innovation in military contexts.
* Experience in consultative roles—either within a consulting firm or as an internal advisor.
* Familiarity with frameworks for CIO advisory, value realization, and program assurance.
* A relevant academic background (MBA or military equivalent is a plus).
* A passion for shaping the future of defense through technology.


**Why Join Us?**
 This is a unique opportunity to join a world-class consulting team with a proven track record in the defense sector. You’ll work alongside experts who understand the mission-critical nature of defense operations and are committed to delivering meaningful change.
   

  

 Whether you're transitioning from a long career in the armed forces or looking to expand your impact in a new way—Gartner Consulting offers the platform, the people, and the purpose to make it happen.
   

  

**Our Team Culture**
 At Gartner Consulting Nordics, we believe that great work starts with great people. You’ll be part of a team that is anchored in shared values, deep technology expertise, and a strong sense of purpose. We foster a culture of trust, collaboration, and continuous learning—where every voice is valued and every contribution matters.
   

  

 We also believe in flexibility. Our consultants enjoy the freedom to work from wherever they perform best—whether that’s from home, the office, or on-site with clients. What unites us is not where we work, but how we work: with integrity, curiosity, and a commitment to making a difference.
   

  

**Who are we?**
 At Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT), we guide the leaders who shape the world.
   

  

 Our mission relies on expert analysis and bold ideas to deliver actionable, objective business and technology insights, helping enterprise leaders and their teams succeed with their mission-critical priorities.
   

  

 Since our founding in 1979, we’ve grown to 21,000 associates globally who support ~14,000 client enterprises in ~90 countries and territories. We do important, interesting and substantive work that matters. That’s why we hire associates with the intellectual curiosity, energy and drive to want to make a difference. The bar is unapologetically high. So is the impact you can have here.
   

  

**What makes Gartner a great place to work?**
 Our vast, virtually untapped market potential offers limitless opportunities – opportunities that may not even exist right now – for you to grow professionally and flourish personally. How far you go is driven by your passion and performance.
   

  

 We hire remarkable people who collaborate and win as a team. Together, our singular, unifying goal is to deliver results for our clients.
   

  

 Our teams are inclusive and composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations.
   

  

 We invest in great leaders who bring out the best in you and the company, enabling us to multiply our impact and results. This is why, year after year, we are recognized worldwide as a great place to work.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 Gartner offers world-class benefits, highly competitive compensation and disproportionate rewards for top performers.
   

  

 In our hybrid work environment, we provide the flexibility and support for you to thrive — working virtually when it's productive to do so and getting together with colleagues in a vibrant community that is purposeful, engaging and inspiring.
   

  

 Ready to grow your career with Gartner? Join us.
   

  

 The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.
   

  

 Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at +1 (203) 964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com.
   

  

 Job Requisition ID:100815
   

  

 By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.
   

  

 Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policy
   

  

**For efficient navigation through the application, please only use the back button within the application, not the back arrow within your browser.**

title: Internship within AI Training Content Creation
description:
**Last date to apply:**
 11 March 2026
   

  

*We are now looking for students within computer science, AI/ML engineering, data science or related technical programs who are interested in doing their internship with us in the Enterprise AI organization.*
 As Husqvarna Group continues scaling AI across the company, we aim to strengthen our internal capability-building efforts. For 2026, we are seeking an intern who will help us create high‑quality AI training content targeted at AI creators—a technically savvy audience working hands‑on with developing AI products.
   

  

 The internship will focus on developing training modules that introduce, explain and contextualize key themes relevant for modern AI product development. In 2026, the prioritized themes are:
   

  

* MLOps best practices (e.g., model versioning, ML pipelines)
* Agents and Agent Orchestration (Agentic AI and Autonomous Systems concepts)
* AI Product Lifecycle and Deliverables (what to deliver when, and why)


 The intern will gather material and propose content based on their academic knowledge, interviews with in‑house experts, online research, and internal guidance such as
 *How We Work* 
 .
   

  

 Proper area of education
   

  

 Computer science / data science / AI & machine learning / software engineering / technical programs with exposure to MLOps, ML engineering or applied AI development.
   

  

 The internship will include work such as
   

  

* Researching and proposing relevant subtopics, examples and learning paths for each training theme
* Conducting interviews with internal experts to capture best practices and insights
* Creating structured e‑learning content in English optimized for Curious by Nature (CbN)
* Developing short assessments (quizzes or similar) for each module
* Ensuring all material follows the internal training development process
* Packaging each training topic into an approx. 1‑hour learning experience
* Suggesting further‑learning paths such as books, scientific publications or online resources
* Collaborating closely with the AI Training & Adoption coordinator, Enterprise AI members, and the CbN team


 Deliverables
   

  

 At the end of the internship, the ambition is to have a complete set of three e‑learning training packages, one per theme, published in Curious by Nature and ready for rollout.
   

  

 Profile
   

  

 Technical requirements
   

  

* Experience developing at least two AI projects
* Understanding of principles related to AI product development, including DevOps/MLOps and coding best practices
* Ability to synthesize complex technical information and communicate it clearly


 Soft skills
   

  

* Curiosity and passion for learning
* Strong communication and interviewing skills
* Ability to summarize, structure, and package information into engaging learning content
* Strong command of written and spoken English


 Academic background
   

  

 Third‑year university students or higher who seek a technically‑oriented internship (not strictly software‑development focused). Students pursuing graduate studies are also welcome.
   

  

 Ideal candidate
   

  

 Someone who enjoys reading, researching, and synthesizing information—potentially with ambitions toward AI research or technical strategy. This role suits individuals who thrive on deep exploration and structured knowledge creation.
   

  

 How to apply
   

  

 Please send in your application with CV and cover letter as soon as possible.
   

  

 Due to GDPR, we do not accept applications by email.
   

  

 Start date of the internship is Q1 / Q2 2026.
   

  

 For questions regarding the internship, please contact:
   

  

 Witold Pawlus, witold.pawlus@husqvarnagroup.com
   

  

 Read about Husqvarna Group here:
   

  

 https://www.husqvarnagroup.com/

title: Technical Account Manager, Google Cloud Consulting
description:
**Minimum qualifications:**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
* 5 years of experience in a customer-facing role working with stakeholders, driving customer technical implementations or transformation programs.
* Experience supporting customers in cloud operations (e.g., launch or capacity planning, product release management), technical support, escalation management, or IT consulting.


**Preferred qualifications:**
* MBA or Master’s degree in a Management, Technical, or Engineering field.
* Experience translating business requirements into technological solutions.
* Experience in application or workload migration to public cloud providers.
* Experience collaborating with teams, groups, business units, channel partners, systems integrators, and third-party developers to deliver solutions.
* Understanding of IT operations, database systems, networking, IT security, application development, service architecture, cloud-native application development, hosted services, storage systems, or content delivery networks.
* Ability to communicate in English and Swedish fluently to support client relationship management in this region.


**About the job** 
 Our Google Cloud Consulting organization within Google Cloud delivers product and implementation expertise to our customers to help them get the most out of their Google Cloud investments.
   

  

 As a Technical Account Manager (TAM), you will help customers successfully adopt Google Cloud products. Your previous experience with cloud infrastructure, program management, enterprise technology implementation, strategy development, and customer advocacy will play a critical part in your day-to-day work by driving success at our most critical customers. You will lead the successful adoption of Google Cloud at leading organizations, guiding them through the technical facets of their Cloud transformation journey.
   

  

 In this role, you will drive customer adoption of Google Cloud services like Google Compute Engine, Vertex AI, Google Kubernetes Engine, BigQuery, and many more. You will regularly engage with stakeholder groups, including executives of large enterprises and a cross-functional and geographically dispersed team. You will utilize relationship management skills and technical credibility to effectively communicate at all levels of the organization, establishing yourself as a trusted advisor.
   

  

 You will travel (domestically and internationally) up to approximately 20% of the time as needed.
   

  

 Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Accelerate customer adoption of Google Cloud by leading the implementation journey. Provide technical guidance and manage timelines, milestones, migration goals, and business transformation strategies.
* Advocate for customer needs in order to overcome adoption blockers and drive new feature development. Lead across multiple workstreams and teams to maintain customer momentum.
* Develop relationships with stakeholders to understand customer’s business, develop roadmaps, and lead quarterly business reviews and executive sessions to better understand business and technical needs.
* Plan for customer events and launches, partnering with support, engineers, and site reliability engineers to ensure customer success, and work with customers and support to guide issues/escalations to resolution.
* Develop best practices and assets based on learnings from customer engagements to support initiatives to scale through partners and accelerate Google Cloud adoption.


 Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

title: Dansktalande IT Supporttekniker
description:
*Talar och skriver du flytande danska och brinner för IT? Tycker du om att hjälpa andra och lösa tekniska problem? Då kan detta vara möjligheten för dig!*
 Vi söker en serviceinriktad IT Supporttekniker som vill bli en del av vår kunds härliga och kunniga servicedesk. Hos oss får du arbeta i ett innovativt bolag i framkant, där du hjälper kunder och användare med tekniska frågor, felsökning och support i en modern IT-miljö.
   

  

 I rollen som IT Supporttekniker är du en problemlösare med varierande arbetsuppgifter och utmaningar. Du har möjlighet att få djupare insyn i olika IT-miljöer och hitta lösningar på mer komplexa IT-problem. Du kommer att ansvara för felsökning av både hård- och mjukvara samt hantering av inkommande ärenden via telefon, e-post och ärendehanteringssystem. Du arbetar i en Windows-miljö med Microsoft 365 och sköter kontoadministration i Active Directory och Azure/Entra ID.
   

  

**Ansvarsområden**
* Ta emot ärenden från deras kunds användare och ge ett bra bemötande.
* Hantering av klientdatorer, servrar och mobiltelefoner.
* Windows-miljö, Microsoft 365 och tillhörande företagsapplikationer samt administration i Active Directory.
* Följa upp och slutföra deras användares ärenden med fokus på kundnöjdhet.
* Identifiera och rapportera återkommande problem inom deras supportleverans.


**För att du ska trivas i rollen** 
 som IT Supporttekniker hos oss ser vi att du är serviceinriktad, noggrann och stresstålig. Du är en lagspelare som gillar att jobba i grupp. Du trivs i en miljö där man delar kunskap med varandra och ligger i framkant vad beträffar tjänster och teknik.
   

  

**Vad Vi Söker Hos Dig**
* Stort intresse inom IT
* Meriterande om du har erfarenhet av kundtjänst eller teknisk support
* Kunskap inom exempelvis Microsoft 365, nätverk, Windows Server och hårdvara
* Flytande i både danska, svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Start** 
 : Omgående start med hänsyn till uppsägningstid. Uppdraget är på heltid och är tillsvidare
   

  

**Placeringsort:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Ansökan:** 
 Intervjuer sker löpande och tillsättning sker vid rätt match
   

  

  

  

**Vad Vi Står För**
 Vi på Camai erbjuder ett av marknadens branschledande anställningsvillkor med stor frihet som ledord. Vi drivs av att hitta det bästa uppdraget för våra medarbetare. Det roligaste som finns är att hitta en perfekt matchning mellan konsult och kund. Vi vet att alla har ett drömarbete, och vi är ett tight entreprenörsdrivet team som arbetar för att se till att du tycker att det är roligt att gå till jobbet, varje dag. Vi tror att kompetenta människor dras till varandra och vill jobba med likasinnade i spännande kunduppdrag.
   

  

 Vi har en av marknadens mest förmånliga ersättningsmodell anpassad för en modern konsultorganisation med mycket frihet. Vi har helt enkelt kul tillsammans!
   

  

**Varför ska du välja oss?**
 Med många års erfarenhet i konsultbranschen har vi valt våra tre värdeord med omsorg; kommunikation, ambition och balans. För att lyckas tror vi att våra medarbetare får vara med och forma sitt arbete efter prioriteringar och intresse i livet. Med din ambition och rätt verktyg från oss ser vi till att du utvecklas och samtidigt belönas på vägen.
   

  

*Vill du vara en del av vår fortsatta tillväxt?*

title: Process Owner to Business Continuity Management Services | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Join us at the forefront of operational resilience. Are you driven by structure, strategy, and making a meaningful impact?
   

  

 SEB is looking for a proactive and forward-thinking Global Process Owner to join our newly established Business Continuity Management Services (BCMS) function – a vital part of the growing Risk Services function. In this key role, you'll help shape SEB’s global approach to business continuity and crisis management, ensuring we’re prepared for the unexpected and resilient in the face of disruption.
   

  

**About The Job**
 As Process Owner within BCM Services, you will play a central role in taking SEB’s well-established business continuity and crisis management framework to the next level. With a solid and mature foundation already in place, your mission will be to evolve and modernize our group-wide methodology to meet the demands of a dynamic risk landscape and an increasingly complex regulatory environment.
   

  

 You’ll lead the full BCM lifecycle – from risk assessments and business impact analyses (BIA) to recovery planning, crisis response, and testing – while continuously looking for ways to simplify, streamline, and future-proof our approach. Innovation is at the heart of the BCM Services team: we actively explore new ways of working, use data in smarter ways, and apply technology to strengthen preparedness and resilience.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll collaborate with stakeholders across the bank to embed BCM processes into daily operations, ensuring they are understood, implemented, and continuously improved. You’ll be part of a highly engaged, forward-looking team within SEB’s Risk Services function, reporting to the Head of BCM Services. This is a unique opportunity to contribute strategically while driving real, hands-on impact in one of SEB’s most important areas of operational resilience.
   

  

**Among Other Responsibilities, You Will Work With**
* Lead the development and implementation of a BCM methodology covering risk assessments, continuity planning, testing, and recovery.
* Together with the team, oversee the full BCM lifecycle, ensuring plans are regularly updated, tested, and aligned with regulations.
* Lead development of crises management process and work with cross-functional teams to develop, refine, and maintain crisis management plans.
* Ensure the CMT is well-prepared for handling a range of crises, including ICT incidents, operational disruptions, and external events, as part of a comprehensive business continuity plan.
* Collaborate with internal teams, external partners, and ensure compliance with regulations.


**To thrive in this role we believe you have**
* An education in business continuity, crisis management, or related fields, with BCM certifications being a plus.
* Proven experience of 5+ years in business continuity management, disaster recovery, or crisis management, ideally within financial services, with a focus on process ownership.
* Experience in managing the BCM lifecycle and ensuring compliance with regulatory standards.
* Strong project management, analytical, and communication skills to lead collaboration and drive strategic improvements.
* The ability to challenge the status quo and contribute to the modernization of existing frameworks through innovative thinking, data-driven insights, and smart use of technology.
* Leadership capabilities to engage and inspire stakeholders, build trust, and foster a culture of preparedness across the organization.
* Fluency in both Swedish and English.
* A mindset to drive projects as well as skills to understand, develop and implement solutions.


**What We Offer**
* An empowering and dynamic work environment where you can make a significant impact on SEB’s resilience and operational stability.
* An opportunity to be a part of a newly established team and be part of deciding the strategy for the team’s mission.
* A chance to collaborate with teams across divisions and geographies, contributing to the enhancement of SEB’s risk management capabilities.
* A caring, supportive and respectful culture.
* Opportunities for continuous learning, professional development, and career growth.


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Apply by attaching your CV and a cover letter that highlights your relevant skills and experiences and how they align with the role. Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2026-03-11. If you have questions about the position, please contact Jonas Simryd, Head of Business Continuity Management, at jonas.simryd@seb.se or Madeleine Gustâv, Talent Acquisition Partner, at madeleine.gustav@seb.se, but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 As part of this recruitment process, the final candidate will undergo an extended security screening. This may include, but is not limited to, identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug tests.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: STOCKHOLM - Rental Agent (m/f/d)
description:
**The role – your passion**
* You will actively assist with vehicle maintenance and take care of the interior and exterior cleaning of our campers
* You will support customer service by putting a smile on our customers' faces when they pick up and return their campers, making their roadsurfer journey unforgettable
* You will support our station team in all daily tasks and ensure that our #happyroadsurfer customers drive off happily on vacation


**What You Need To Surf The Wave With Us**
* Hands-on mentality: For you, it goes without saying that you will pick up a cloth and make our campers shine again
* Class B driver's license: You know how to drive a vehicle
* Communication skills: Swedish or English – the main thing is that you can communicate easily with customers


**Your contract**
* YOUR CONTRACT OPTIONS: Part-time or zero-hour contract – together we will find the right model for you
* YOUR SALARY: 185 SEK/hour
* YOUR WORKING DAYS: Depending on availability, Mon-Sat 8:00 a.m. – 7:00 p.m.
* YOUR WORK LOCATION: Okvistavägen 15, 186 40 Vallentuna
* YOUR START DATE: 1st April - 31st October


**ABOUT #ROADSURFER**
 We are more than Europe's largest campervan rental company. In 2021 we launched our platform roadsurfer spots in addition to our other products rent, abo and sales – a platform where you can discover and book unique camping spots. But that’s only the beginning. We are growing fast, so hop on board and join us on our journey. The roadsurfer philosophy is simple: rent an RV, start your adventure, be happy. Come ride the wave with us!

title: INTERNSHIP - PR & film release strategy
description:
**Rio Releases Film with a focus on Nordic audiences aged 18–35** 




  





 As an intern at Rio, you’ll step straight into the PR engine behind our film releases – from early positioning and first buzz to premiere week and beyond. You’ll work closely with the team to craft communication strategies, find the sharpest angles for each title, and help shape how our films show up in the world – across press, partnerships and digital culture.
 



  





 This internship offers hands-on experience in how PR, communication and film marketing work in an international context. You’ll help build visibility, spark conversation, and make sure every release reaches the audience it’s meant for – by bringing creative ideas into our strategies, building buzz, and making the film feel culturally relevant.
 



  





 We’re looking for a student currently studying Marketing, PR, or Strategic Communication.

title: License Owner, Stockholm
description:
Passionate about football (soccer) AND about business? Stranger Soccer is expanding to key cities around the world. We are looking for a License Owner to open and operate the Stranger Soccer business in Stockholm.
   

  

 This is not your traditional management job - it is truly built for someone that wants to own and operate their own business (that happens to make the world's greatest sport accessible to everyone). This role is ideally suited for an adventurous and football-passionate entrepreneur.
   

  

 Sounds Like You?
   

  

 As a next step, please visit www.strangersoccer.com and particularly the section Bring Stranger Soccer to your City to learn more about this dynamic opportunity. If it appears to be a fit, and you wish to learn more, please fill out the form there to officially express your interest. Be sure to download and explore the Stranger Soccer mobile app as well.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Bring the Stranger Soccer brand and business to life for the assigned city
   

  

 Recruit, train, and lead a small central team (2-3 persons) as well as a few freelance Official Hosts (game hosts) to kick off the operation
   

  

 Identify and secure prime slots at football venues to run Stranger Soccer games
   

  

 Engage in creative sales and marketing digital and hands-onto ensure that customers are introduced to the platform as a convenient and preferred way to play
   

  

 Oversee a schedule of games, ensuring customers are delighted with each game they play, and keep coming back for more
   

  

 Take advantage of the strong backing and direction of Singapore headquarters, where an operations and technology team is ready to support you.
   

  

 You should have
   

  

 A passion for football, and a strong connection to your local football scene
   

  

 A business background, ideally in management and customer service
   

  

 An entrepreneurial background or spirit
   

  

 A commitment to owning, driving, and scaling the Stranger Soccer brand in the assigned market
   

  

 A hunger to succeed: financial compensation for this role will be proportionate to hard work, business acumen, and effectiveness.
   

  

**About Stranger Soccer**
 With 3.5 billion football enthusiasts in over 200 countries, football is the most popular sport in the world. But why don't more people play it? Stranger Soccer (www.strangersoccer.com) makes playing football as easy as going for a jog or to the gym. Browse dozens of games on its acclaimed Mobile App. Book a slot. Turn up and play.
   

  

 Incorporated in 2017, Stranger Soccer has quickly transformed the sports & recreation scene in Singapore. In a few short years, it has grown to be the #1-way people play football and futsal in the country, amassing tens of thousands of registered users purchasing thousands of slots every week. Whether you call it Fussball, Fútbol, Calcio, or anything else, the world now awaits.
   

  

 Our Mission
   

  

 To make playing football as easy as going for a jog.
   

  

 Our Vision
   

  

 A world in which playing football is as popular and widespread as watching football.
   

  

 Got what it takes?
   

  

 We encourage you to visit www.strangersoccer.com to learn more about this dynamic opportunity, and to express your interest. Be sure to download and explore the Stranger Soccer mobile app as well. We look forward to meeting you.

title: VMware Specialist
description:
Vår kund i centrala Stockholm söker en Senior VMware Specialist till ett uppdrag i en spännande IT-miljö. För att ta nästa steg i utvecklingen av virtualiseringsplattformen söker organisationen en expert inom VMware som kan bidra i teamet.
   

  

 I rollen blir du en viktig del i arbetet med att designa och implementera framtidens virtualiseringsplattform. Du arbetar tillsammans med kollegor, och ansvarar även för att dokumentera lösningar samt säkerställa att kunskap överförs till övriga team.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
* Utformning och implementation av VMware-baserade lösningar
* Automation och orkestrering av infrastruktur
* Förvaltning och vidareutveckling av virtualiseringsplattformen
* Dokumentation av tekniska lösningar och arbetssätt
* Kunskapsöverföring till organisationen
* Arbeta i enlighet med agila metoder


**Kravprofil**
 Vi söker dig som har djup erfarenhet av automation och orkestrering av IT-infrastruktur samt stark teknisk kompetens inom VMware. För denna rollen ser vi att du har djup kompetens inom följande områden:
   

  

* VMware Aria Automation
* VMware Aria Orchestrator
* VMware vCloud Director
* VMware NSX-T
* VMware SRM / Live Recovery


 Du har även god erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Git (GitHub/GitLab)
* PowerShell
* JavaScript


**Som person** 
 är du strukturerad, analytisk och lösningsorienterad, vilket gör att du kan ta ansvar för komplexa tekniska utmaningar och driva dem framåt på ett tydligt och effektivt sätt. Du har förmågan att bryta ner stora problem i hanterbara delar, skapa tydliga lösningar och dokumentera dem så att de kan användas av både tekniska team och intressenter. Du trivs i en miljö där du får arbeta självständigt men också samarbeta nära kollegor och du bidrar aktivt till att förbättra processer och arbetssätt inom teamet.
   

  

**Start** 
 : Omgående start med hänsyn till uppsägningstid. Uppdraget är på heltid och är tillsvidare
   

  

**Placeringsort:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Ansökan:** 
 Intervjuer sker löpande och tillsättning sker vid rätt match
   

  

**Vad vi står för:**
 Vi på Camai erbjuder ett av marknadens branschledande anställningsvillkor med stor frihet som ledord. Vi drivs av att hitta det bästa uppdraget för våra medarbetare. Det roligaste som finns är att hitta en perfekt matchning mellan konsult och kund. Vi vet att alla har ett drömarbete, och vi är ett tight entreprenörsdrivet team som arbetar för att se till att du tycker att det är roligt att gå till jobbet, varje dag. Vi tror att kompetenta människor dras till varandra och vill jobba med likasinnade i spännande kunduppdrag.
   

  

 Vi har en av marknadens mest förmånliga ersättningsmodell anpassad för en modern konsultorganisation med mycket frihet. Vi har helt enkelt kul tillsammans!
   

  

**Varför ska du välja oss?**
 Med många års erfarenhet i konsultbranschen har vi valt våra tre värdeord med omsorg; kommunikation, ambition och balans. För att lyckas tror vi att våra medarbetare får vara med och forma sitt arbete efter prioriteringar och intresse i livet. Med din ambition och rätt verktyg från oss ser vi till att du utvecklas och samtidigt belönas på vägen.
   

  

*Hoppas att du vill vara en del av vår fortsatta tillväxt!*

title: Operations & HR Coordinator
description:
**SpeakCharlie**
 At SpeakCharlie, we provide language and cultural training to companies around the world. We support international professionals and teams in navigating new workplaces, cultures, and ways of communicating — helping people feel included, confident, and able to contribute fully.
   

  

 We are growing fast and are looking for someone who wants to grow with us.
   

  

**About The Role**
 This is a hands-on, high-responsibility role at the operational core of our company. You will coordinate courses and events across countries and time zones, match participants with the right coaches, and ensure that every learning experience runs smoothly from start to finish.
   

  

 At the same time, you will help expand and strengthen our global coach network — screening candidates, conducting interviews, and supporting onboarding.
   

  

 Because we work internationally across multiple time zones, flexibility, ownership, and drive are essential. The pace is dynamic, priorities can shift quickly, and you will often be balancing several moving parts at once. You should enjoy that energy and thrive in it. This role is ideal for someone who wants to contribute to building and scaling something meaningful — not just maintaining the status quo.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**Operations & Global Coordination**
* Coordinating and scheduling language courses and cultural trainings across time zones
* Matching participants with the most suitable coach based on skills, experience, availability, and group dynamics
* Acting as the main point of contact for participants and coaches
* Managing changes and solving operational challenges quickly and professionally
* Improving and building scalable processes as we grow


**HR & Coach Recruitment**
* Screening applications from new language coaches globally
* Conducting phone and video interviews
* Assessing competence, communication style, and cultural fit
* Managing contracts and onboarding documentation
* Supporting and developing our international coach network


**Who You Are**
* Highly organized and detail-oriented
* Comfortable taking ownership and making decisions
* Driven, proactive, and solution-oriented
* Energized by growth and responsibility
* Strong communicator across cultures
* Comfortable working in a fast-moving, entrepreneurial environment
* Fluent in English (Swedish is a plus)
* Why Join SpeakCharlie?


**Why join SpeakCharlie?**
 You will play a key role in a growing international company where your contribution truly matters. You will gain responsibility early, work closely with leadership, and help shape how we scale. If you enjoy creating structure in complexity and being part of building something ambitious and international — we would love to hear from you.

title: SAP Programme Manager
description:
**SAP Programme Manager – Global S/4HANA Programme** 




  





 InterEx Group are seeking a SAP Programme Manager to join a leading global brand based in Stockholm, working on a multi-year greenfield S/4HANA transformation programme. This role involves leading a multi-national deployment across Europe and the US.
 



  





 The role will be remote-based, with 3 days on on-site per week in Stockholm, Sweden.
 



  





**Key Skills / Deliverables:** 




  




* Lead and manage the end-to-end global S/4HANA programme, ensuring delivery against business objectives, timelines, and budget.
* Oversee the design and rollout of the global SAP template, aligning with finance, logistics, and business stakeholders.
* Coordinate multiple workstreams (FICO, OTC, PTP, Supply Chain, HR, etc.) to ensure seamless programme execution.
* Drive governance, stakeholder management, and programme reporting to senior leadership and the steering committee.
* Ensure effective collaboration between business, IT, and systems integrator partners across regions.
* Oversee data migration, integration, and cutover strategies to secure smooth transitions.
* Build and manage project teams (internal and external), ensuring clear responsibilities and quality of delivery.
* Proven experience in leading global SAP S/4HANA programmes (template design and multi-country rollout).
* Strong track record of programme governance, stakeholder management, and vendor management.
* Experience working in complex, multi-national organisations with large-scale SAP transformations.



  





**All candidates MUST be EU based for this role.**

title: Sales Business Development
description:
TEKsystems’® unmatched success in the IT Services and Talent Management marketplace is driven by one thing – our employees. A thriving IT industry has caused us to grow at a rapid pace and we are looking for Account Managers to join our team. We offer great opportunities for advancement, personal and professional growth, and unlimited earning potential.
 



  





 TEKsystems seeks professional individuals with competitive spirit, drive, team mentality, commitment, perseverance, and a desire to build a long-term career in a rewarding environment.
 



  





**The Opportunity** 




 As an Account Manager, you will become an expert in your sales specialism and will be responsible for developing and growing an account base within your designated territory. You will provide insight, conduct deep discovery and demonstrate differentiation to clients to win new business, expand existing accounts, and provide exceptional service to all current and potential clients.
 



  





**The Perks** 



* Competitive base salary
* Uncapped commission.
* Annual all-inclusive company incentive trips.
* Charitable and social responsibility opportunities.
* Health and well-being support



  





**What you will contribute** 



* Working as an Account Manager, your ability to build collaborative and productive partnerships with our team of recruiters will be essential throughout the sales lifecycle to ensure your clients’ hiring needs are fulfilled.
* **You will:**
* Provide insight and demonstrate differentiation to clients to win new business and support the expansion of existing accounts.
* Partner with internal talent delivery teams to ensure client opportunity is sourced and fulfilled, (including oversight of sourcing, screening and onboarding).
* Provide exceptional customer service at all times.
* Have a keen interest in up-skilling on the latest market trends enabling you to act as a trusted advisor to clients.



  





**What you bring to the table:** 



* Two to five years experience in recruitment sales and account management (including proven ability to identify, develop and convert new business opportunities).
* Ability to demonstrate effectiveness in market territory planning.
* Ability to effectively plan and execute a business development strategy.
* Proven experience working in a performance-based environment.
* Passion for networking and communicating both virtually and in person.
* Grit, tenacity, and determination.



  





**Extra Points if you have:** 



* Demonstrable recruitment experience within the technology sector.
* Prior experience using Salesforce CRM tool.
* Exposure to industry standard services sales methodologies (e.g. MEDDIC, Business Value Messaging etc.).



  





**Looking for Career Growth? We’ve got you!** 




 When you choose to join TEKsystems as an Account Manager, we will ensure that you progress your career on your terms. We are structured in such a way that you will have multiple opportunities to choose from. You might continue to become an expert in sales or a leader of one of our high performing sales teams. With us, your career will soar.
 



  





**Supporting Your Career** 




 As an Account Manager, you will be enrolled on our Sales Development Program and receive dedicated time to support your development. With in-house training and
 



 dedicated coaching from leaders as well as tailored online learning modules, you will receive ample professional development to support your career growth.
 



  





 Are You Ready to Invest in Your Future? Let’s connect.

title: Set Designer, H&M Studios
description:
H&M Studios creates fashion content for H&M’s full assortment globally, including model imagery, product photography and video assets. Our mission is to elevate the full assortment and support H&M in becoming a credible fashion brand.
   

  





 As a set designer, you will design and create inspiring settings for a wide range of photo productions. You will plan and organise set designs based on production briefs, ensuring each layout is completed on time and in line with creative direction. The role includes sourcing, ordering and purchasing props and materials, as well as developing and building your own creations when needed.
   

  





 You will work across multiple projects simultaneously and collaborate closely with production teams, photographers, stylists and other stakeholders on a daily basis to deliver high-quality results.
   

  





**WHAT YOU’LL DO**




 You will:
   

  




* Plan, design and organize set for photo productions.
* Prepare set by building/constructing, painting, sewing, ordering, purchasing and/or renting props.
* Schedule and coordinate set construction and teardown according to shoot calendar
* Collaborate and communicate with production team
* Brief production team on safety of how the set works
* Handle, organize and store all in-house set design props and materials.
* Manage set budget, ensuring cost-effective solutions without compromising quality
* Invoice handling and other administrative tasks



**WHO YOU ARE**




 As a person, we believe you are a humble and driven team player. You are highly organised and structured, with a service-minded approach. You enjoy finding smart solutions to challenges and are curious to learn, grow and contribute to the development of our business.
   

  





 You work well under pressure and feel confident managing several projects at the same time. You are used to making your own decisions and giving constructive feedback that helps improve ways of working.
   

  





 We are looking for people with....
   

  




* Experience in set design or a background in film, theatre scenography or similar creative fields.
* Strong carpentry skills; basic sewing and furniture‑upholstery knowledge is an advantage.
* Experience in working with both motion and still image production is meritorious.
* Demonstrated organizational and planning skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Excellent Swedish and English language skills, both written and verbal.
* Drivers licence B+ is required



  

  

  

  




**Additional Information**

 This is a
 **permanent full-time** 
 position with start date ASAP, based at
 **H&M Studios at Frihamnen, Stockholm.** 
 Please upload your CV as soon as possible but at the latest by
 **20th February 2026** 
 . Due to GDPR, we only accept applications through our career page.
   

  





 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  





**WHO WE ARE** 






 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  





 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  





**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE** 








  

  

 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  




* 25% Staff discount on all our H&M Group brands, both in stores and online (H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories and ARKET).


* H&M Incentive Program – HIP. Learn more about the program here.


* In addition to our global benefits, our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. (Example: Competitive compensation for your dedication and long-term commitment. A day off on your birthday to relax and celebrate your special day. Special gift to celebrate the birth of your child, etc.)



**JOIN US** 






 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  





 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.
   

  





 We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.

title: Systemutvecklare
description:
B3 utmärker oss genom vår djupa systemutvecklingskompetens och förmåga att leverera kompletta lösningar för våra kunder. Vi kombinerar även avancerad AI-teknik med en förståelse för affärsbehov och tar ansvar för hela utvecklingsprocessen. Vår styrka ligger i att skapa hållbara och skalbara lösningar som stödjer kundens verksamhet och långsiktiga mål.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Teamet i Stockholm består av ett gäng kollegor med kompetens inom både backend, frontend och fullstack, vilka nu söker sin nästa kollega! Att vara konsult på B3 innebär att du hjälper våra kunder i deras utvecklingsprojekt och dagliga utmaningar.
   

  

**Vi letar efter dig som har:**
* Minst 7 års erfarenhet inom systemutveckling Java, .Net eller Python
* Arbetat med cloud-teknologier
* Arbetat med microservices
* God svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Extra glada blir vi om du har:**
* Erfarenhet av DevOps
* Erfarenhet av moderna frontend-ramverk
* Intresse av AI teknik


**Vad vi erbjuder:**
 Att vi trivs tillsammans på B3 är otroligt viktigt. Anledningen till att många börjar hos oss är bland annat det stora fokuset på
 **kompetensutveckling** 
 , där vi kontinuerligt delar kunskap med varandra och uppmuntrar till kompetensutveckling och certifieringar. Vi erbjuder bland annat:
   

  

* Generös kompetensutveckling
* Attraktiv lönemodell
* En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning


**Om B3**
 B3 är en börsnoterad koncern och trygg arbetsgivare med hög medarbetarnöjdhet. B3 har ca 1000 medarbetare inom många olika expertområden. B3 är rankad som Sveriges tredje bästa arbetsplats 2021 av Great Place to Work, utsett till Sveriges IT Karriärföretag 2022 och 2023, samt vann utmärkelsen Årets Karriärföretag 2022. Vi lever efter våra värdeord erfarenhet, olikheter och energi samt satsar på hållbarhet i alla led. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra presterar bättre och har därför B3 Team som anordnar aktiviteter inom wellness, från yoga och löpning till musikquiz och föreläsningar om stresshantering och mental hälsa.
   

  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!**
 Har du frågor om tjänsten? Tveka inte att kontakta rekryteringsansvarig för denna tjänst, Lidia Hagos, på lidia.hagos@b3.se.

title: IT arkitekt infrastruktur
description:
Vi söker nu en IT arkitekt infrastruktur till vår IT-avdelning.
   

  

 På IT-avdelningen är vi ca 350 medarbetare och vårt samhällsviktiga uppdrag gör att vi behöver bli fler. Som en del av vår IT-avdelning kommer du att jobba i en utvecklande miljö, med fokus på medarbetares engagemang och nya idéer. Vi lägger samtidigt mycket energi på att skapa en inkluderande kultur med fokus på jämställdhet och hållbara medarbetare. Vi tror att olika perspektiv och erfarenheter gör oss bättre!
   

  

**Om jobbet**
 Rollen innebär huvudsakligen att jobba med infrastrukturarkitektur inom IT-infrastrukturenheten i syfte att stödja organisationen så vi får den mest optimala infrastrukturarkitekturen både ur ett tekniskt och ekonomiskt perspektiv.
   

  

 Du ansvarar för att analysera, utvärdera, planera, dokumentera och besluta om infrastrukturarkitektur samt säkerställa att beslutad arkitektur följs.
   

  

 Vårt team med infrastrukturarkitekter består i dag av en handfull personer och vi behöver bli fler.
   

  

 Vår utveckling inom IT-avdelningen sker enligt SAFe-ramverket. Vi är virtuellt organiserade i en tågstruktur enligt SAFe-ramverket och det finns ett infrastrukturtåg.
   

  

**Din profil**
 För att trivas i rollen som IT arkitekt infrastruktur hos oss är det viktigt att du som person har god analytisk och problemlösande förmåga samt en god samarbetsförmåga. Du behöver kunna ta egna initiativ, ha ett gott omdöme och ha en helhetssyn på verksamheten för att kunna verka i rollen.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och lämplighet för rollen.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Minst gymnasieutbildning
* Mycket goda kunskaper om infrastrukturarkitektur, server, virtualisering, container, lagring, nätverk
* God förmåga att dokumentera och presentera infrastrukturarkitektur
* Minst tre års erfarenhet av att ha jobbat i en motsvarande roll
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


 Det är meriterande om du har:
   

  

* Akademisk utbildning inom relevant område
* Erfarenhet av att ha jobbat med infrastrukturarkitektur inom en större organisation
* Erfarenhet av arbete enligt agila metoder som tex SAFe


**Vi erbjuder**
 Ett myndighetsuppdrag som är viktigt på riktigt! En arbetsplats där vi värnar om att våra medarbetare ska ha en god balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi erbjuder flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet att jobba delvis hemifrån. Som statligt anställd har du även goda anställningsvillkor och ett förmånspaket med friskvård, lediga klämdagar samt goda semester- och pensionsvillkor. Vårt kontor i Stockholm ligger centralt.
   

  

 Du kan läsa mer om våra förmåner och hur det är att jobba hos oss här.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid och vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Anställningen kan komma att placeras i säkerhetsklass.
   

  

 Placeringsort är Stockholm eller Luleå.
   

  

**Din ansökan**
 Vi jobbar kompetensbaserat i hela processen och är måna om en inkluderande, rättvis, objektiv och kandidatvänlig process. Därför ber vi dig att besvara ett antal urvalsfrågor istället för att be om personligt brev.
   

  

 Vi kan komma att använda oss av arbetspsykologiska tester.
   

  

 Har du skyddade personuppgifter kontakta rekryterande chef som hjälper dig med din ansökan.
   

  

 Vi strävar efter en jämn könsfördelning och ser mångfald som en styrka och välkomnar därför sökande med olika bakgrund.
   

  

 Inför rekryteringsarbetet har vi tagit ställning till annonskanaler och marknadsföring. Vi undanber oss därför ytterligare kontakt med media-/annonsförsäljare, rekryteringssajter och liknande.
   

  

 Pensionsmyndigheten ansvarar för den allmänna pensionen och informerar om hela pensionen. Varje år betalar vi ut cirka 415 miljarder kronor till 2,3 miljoner pensionärer, genomför cirka 911 000 fondbyten och skickar ut 8 miljoner orange kuvert. Vi har ca 25 miljoner digitala kundkontakter per år. Vi är cirka 1700 medarbetare på åtta orter, från Luleå i norr till Halmstad i söder.
   

  

 Vi gör pensionen enklare.
   

  

 #VårtJobbBeröralla
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100 | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: PSL 2026-13 | Kontakt: Per Schölin 46104542258, | Facklig företrädare: Anna-Karin Åhrman Cortelius, Saco-s 010-4543914, Michael Karlsson, ST 010-4543427, | Publicerat: 2026-02-19 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2026-03-09

title: IT Project Manager and Digital Transformation
description:
At Electrolux Professional Group we hire to meet needs beyond tomorrow
 



  





 UNLOCK YOUR POTENTIAL
 



 At Electrolux Professional Group, we believe potential powers progress. We’re not searching for perfection—we’re looking for people with the right mindset. If you're curious, resilient, and ready to grow, you'll find the space to lead, innovate, and together with us Meet the needs beyond tomorrow.
 



  





 https://www.electroluxprofessionalgroup.com/en/join-us/
 



  





 IT PROJECT MANAGER - DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION (SALESFORCE ECOSYSTEM)
 



 Hybrid - European entities
 



  





 WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING
 



 As an
 **IT Project Manager** 
 you will lead and deliver group-wide digital transformation initiatives with a strong focus on
 **B2B eCommerce, CRM, and back-office efficiency** 
 .
 



 In this role, you will work closely with business stakeholders across Sales, Marketing, Customer Service, and Operations to translate business needs into successful digital solutions. You will manage hands-on delivery of projects primarily within the
 **Salesforce ecosystem** 
 , including Commerce Cloud, Sales Cloud, and Service Cloud.
 



 This role requires strong collaboration skills, a pragmatic mindset, and a
 **hands-on, can-do attitude** 
 .
 



  





 KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
 



**Project & Delivery Management** 



* Lead end-to-end delivery of digital transformation projects, from initiation to rollout and adoption
* Manage multiple projects simultaneously, including:
* B2B webshop implementations
* New project scoping, discovery, planning and execution
* CRM project management
* Back-office and operational efficiency initiatives
* Define project scope, timelines, milestones, risks, and dependencies
* Ensure projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget
* Track, monitor and report project and product KPIs



**Stakeholder & Business Collaboration** 



* Act as the primary bridge between IT, business stakeholders, and external partners
* Facilitate workshops and requirement-gathering sessions with business teams
* Translate business needs into clear functional and technical requirements
* Proactively manage stakeholder expectations and communication



**Salesforce Ecosystem** 



* Work hands-on within the Salesforce ecosystem, including:
* Salesforce Commerce Cloud (B2B)
* Salesforce Marketing Cloud
* Salesforce Sales Cloud
* Salesforce Service Cloud
* Coordinate with internal teams, Salesforce administrators, developers, and implementation partners
* Support user adoption, change management, and continuous improvement



**Adoption & Change** 



* Drive user adoption and ensure solutions deliver measurable business value
* Ensure successful transition to internal support, including training, documentation, and operational readiness.
* Identify opportunities for process optimization and automation



  





 WHAT’S NEEDED FOR YOU TO THRIVE
 



**Required Qualifications & Experience** 




**3+ years of experience** 
 as an IT Project Manager or similar role
 



**Proven experience with Salesforce** 
 , including:
 


* Commerce Cloud (B2B preferred)
* Sales Cloud and Service Cloud



 Strong experience delivering
 **CRM, eCommerce, or digital transformation projects** 




 Solid understanding of business processes in sales, customer service, and operations
 



 Experience working in cross-functional, international, or group environments
 



 Comfortable working in a
 **hands-on role** 
 , not just coordinating from a distance
 



**Skills & Competencies** 



* Excellent stakeholder management and communication skills
* Strong organizational and planning abilities. Comfortable managing complex programs with multiple vendors, internal stakeholders, and technical streams.
* Pragmatic, solution-oriented mindset
* Can-do, proactive, and ownership-driven attitude
* Ability to translate business strategy into executable projects
* Strong ability to work in multi-functional teams with shared responsibilities across support, admin, and product roles.
* Experience with Agile, Scrum, or hybrid project methodologies is a plus



  





**Nice to Have** 



* Salesforce certifications (any cloud)
* Experience with B2B and/or B2C eCommerce platforms
* Background in digital transformation or system modernization programs
* Experience working with external system integrators or vendors



  





 OUR CULTURE IN 4 WORDS
 



 Be Customer Obsessed. Build Trust. Be Bold. Act Sustainably.
 



 (We’re building it every day — and we’d love your help.)
 



  





  





 WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU
 



 Trust, ownership, and the opportunity to grow
 



 • Be part of a company grounded in customer focus, sustainability leadership, innovation, and social impact. We aim to Meet Needs Beyond Tomorrow
 



 • The possibility to work hybrid and build a flexible worklife balance
 



 • Be part of an industry shift that makes a difference — in how people live, cook, clean, care, and serve
 



 • Plus: country-specific perks and benefits designed to support your well-being.
 



  





**Electrolux Professional Group - meeting needs beyond tomorrow** 




 Electrolux Professional Group is the sustainability leader in our industry and one of the leading global providers of food service, beverage, and laundry equipment for professional users. Our innovative products and worldwide service network make our customers’ work-life easier, more profitable – and truly sustainable every day. Our solutions and products are sold in over 110 countries. In 2024, the Electrolux Professional Group had global sales of SEK 12.5bn and approximately 4,300 employees. Electrolux Professional’s B-shares are listed at Nasdaq Stockholm. For more information, visit
 
 https://www.electroluxprofessionalgroup.com

title: QA Engineer - Client & Platform
description:
**A Bit About Us**
 Telenor Nordics is consolidating the
 **TV service** 
 and creating a unified Nordic customer experience, with seamless access across TV boxes and mobile platforms.
 **Telenor TV** 
 is one of the largest entertainment services in Norway and the Nordics, offering a wide range of features and connecting to numerous content providers, including Netflix, HBO, Viaplay, Apple TV, YouTube, TV2, and NRK. The service is central to
 **Telenor’s digital strategy in the Nordics** 
 and is continuously evolving to provide reliable streaming experiences for millions of users.
   

  

**How We Work**
 You will join the
 **Nordic TV & Streaming department** 
 , part of a TV tribe that works across all parts of Telenor involved in delivering TV services. The team includes colleagues from
 **product, development, UX, operations, and external suppliers** 
 . Work is done in an
 **agile environment** 
 , with collaboration focused on testing and improving TV and streaming systems. Clear processes and reliable delivery are priorities, with each team member contributing to the team’s work.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 You will
 **plan, design, and execute functional and non-functional tests** 
 and develop and maintain test scenarios, automation scripts, and tools. Responsibilities include verifying requirements, managing cases and issues in
 **Jira** 
 , and testing clients such as Set‑Top Boxes, tablets, Apple, Apple TV, Android, and Web. You will also test
 **backend systems** 
 , covering functions, business logic and order flows.
   

  

**Tasks include:**
* Documenting test results, reporting defects, and retesting fixes
* Presenting risk assessments before releases
* Assisting with incident and problem analysis
* Supporting the tribe and squads in planning and executing QA tasks
* Contributing to QA practices across the team


**What We Are Looking For In An Application**
 A
 **bachelor’s degree or higher in IT** 
 , or relevant experience that compensates for formal education. Training can be offered to candidates with a
 **strong interest in QA** 
 . Ideally, you have
 **experience as a tester or test lead** 
 and have collaborated across
 **technical and non-technical teams** 
 . You should have knowledge of
 **IT and service platform architecture** 
 and the ability to produce
 **documentation, interface descriptions, requirements, and sequence diagrams** 
 . Strong English skills are required, both written and verbal, as Telenor use English as corporate language.
   

  

**Bonus qualifications:**
* Experience with AI-assisted automated testing
* Programming background
* Knowledge of IT security
* Familiarity with TV and streaming technologies
* Competence in client applications and home network technology


**Who are you?**
 You enjoy working with systems, applications, and their interactions. You are collaborative, systematic, and detail oriented. You stay updated on new technologies and are motivated by understanding customer needs and working with product, marketing, and UX teams.
   

  

**Why should you choose us?**
 You will be part of Norway’s largest TV provider, contributing to an important strategic area for Telenor. The role offers varied tasks across disciplines and the chance to work with highly qualified and motivated colleagues.
   

  

 We offer a
 **hybrid way of working with flexibility** 
 , along with opportunities for professional development and long-term career growth. At Telenor, you’ll play a key role in keeping one of our most important customer offerings running smoothly during a critical period. You’ll work with experienced teams across the Nordics, have real responsibility, and make decisions that directly impact customers’ everyday TV and streaming experience.
   

  

 You’ll join an environment that values
 **clarity, trust, and pragmatic execution** 
 - with room to make your mark.
   

  

**Practical Information**
**Application review:** 
 Applications are reviewed on an
 **ongoing basis** 
 .
   

  

**Location:** 
 This position will be based in one of our Telenor offices in the Nordic region: Norway, Sweden or Finland.
   

  

**Contact:** 
 If you have any questions, contact Thomas Holst‑Jæger at thomas.holst‑jaeger@telenor.no. Please note that we cannot accept applications via email.
   

  

**Background checks:** 
 As part of Telenor’s policy, we conduct background checks on final candidates for all recruitments through Semac AS.
   

  

*Telenor Nordics, a business area within the Telenor Group, connects more than 12 million customers across Denmark, Sweden, Finland, and Norway. Our 7,000 Nordic employees are dedicated to building and securing some of the world’s most advanced mobile networks, delivering reliable connectivity, relevant services, and customer excellence. We are committed to being the place where talent thrive and grow as part of a future-ready and empowered workforce, collaborating across the Nordics to create value.*

title: Product Designer
description:
**TL;DR** 
 - We’re looking for world-class product designers to help shape Lovable. You’ll lead projects end-to-end, collaborating closely with engineering. We expect a broad range of design skills, and exceptional taste. You’ll join a team at the forefront of AI, enabling anyone to create software.
   

  

**Why Lovable?**
 Lovable lets anyone and everyone build software with plain English. From solopreneurs to Fortune 100 teams, millions of people use Lovable to transform raw ideas into real products - fast. We are at the forefront of a foundational shift in software creation, which means you have an unprecedented opportunity to change the way the world works. Over 2 million people in 200+ countries already use Lovable to launch businesses, automate work, and bring their ideas to life. And we’re just getting started.
   

  

 We’re a small, talent-dense team building a generation-defining company from Stockholm. We value extreme ownership, high velocity and low-ego collaboration. We seek out people who care deeply, ship fast, and are eager to make a dent in the world.
   

  

**What We’re Looking For**
* A track record of working in high performing, fast-paced startup environments
* A portfolio showcasing successful product work loved by users and produced in high-velocity teams
* Talent for simplifying complicated user journeys into intuitive experiences
* Strong prototyping abilities with emphasis on clear visual communication
* Fluency with design systems and technical implementations
* Outstanding command of visual design, UI patterns, and interaction principles
* High aptitude for shipping and learning extraordinarily quickly
* Bonus: You ship to production, perhaps with a little help from AI
* Bonus: Experience designing AI products


**What You’ll Do**
**In one sentence:** 
 Design Lovable, making it the most Lovable piece of software ever.
   

  

* Craft detailed user flows and high-fidelity mockups for new features
* Own design projects from conception to delivery, collaborating with engineering or ideally implementing yourself with AI (we'll train you)
* Be scrappy and hands on with any design assets needed
* Establish scalable design processes that uphold quality standards
* Champion quick wins and impactful improvements
* Contribute to improving the design quality of Lovable's AI
* Help set the bar for design quality and the culture for how design works at Lovable


**How We Hire**
* Fill in a short form then jump on an initial exploratory call.
* We'll send you a quick take-home asking to present your best work over a loom video presentation.
* Join us for a round of interviews to discuss your experience in more depth
* Join us for trial work lasting 1-2 days remote or on-site. We'll see how you tick and you get to meet the team and explore whether joining Lovable feels right for you.


**Important Note** 
 :
   

  

* Please submit your application in English. It’s our company language so you’ll be speaking lots of it if you join.
* We treat all candidates equally - if you’re interested please apply through our careers portal.

title: Systemintegrationsarkitekt till Ambea
description:
**Nu söker vi en Systemintegrationsarkitekt till Ambeakoncernens huvudkontor i Solna.**
 Ambea är Nordens kunskapsledande omsorgsföretag. Vi verkar genom varumärkena Nytida, Vardaga, Stendi, Altiden, Validia och Klara, och bedriver utbildningsverksamhet inom Lära. Genomgående i våra verksamheter erbjuder vi boende, stöd, utbildning och bemanning inom vård och omsorg. Vi har cirka 38 000 medarbetare på mer än 1000 enheter i Sverige, Norge, Danmark och Finland. Vi ska vara kvalitetsledande i allt vi gör och vår vision är att göra världen lite bättre, en människa i taget. Hos oss kan du utvecklas samtidigt som du gör skillnad för andra. Läs gärna mer
   

  

*Läs gärna mer* 
*här* 
*.*
**Ditt uppdrag**
 Som
 **Integrationsarkitekt och tillika domänägare av Systemintegration** 
 har du ett övergripande ansvar för organisationens arkitektur för system‑till‑system‑integrationer och informationsutbyte. Du säkerställer att integrationer är standardiserade, säkra och skalbara i linje med verksamhetens behov och IT‑strategi.
   

  

 Rollen är strategisk och arbetsledande inom integrationsområdet och innebär att du leder och samordnar arbetet inom System Integration‑domänen, i nära samarbete med verksamhet, lösningsarkitekter, utvecklingsteam och externa leverantörer utan personalansvar. Du har ett tydligt enterprise‑perspektiv och ansvarar för långsiktig hållbarhet, kvalitet och riktning i integrationslandskapet
   

  

**Din erfarenhet och kunskap**
**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Högskoleutbildning inom IT, systemvetenskap, informationsteknik eller motsvarande
* Gedigen erfarenhet av integrationsarkitektur i komplexa IT‑landskap
* Djup kunskap om integrationsmönster såsom API‑baserade integrationer, meddelandebaserade och händelsedrivna arkitekturer
* Erfarenhet av molnbaserade integrationsplattformar, exempelvis Azure Integration Services
* Mycket god förståelse för säkerhetsaspekter kopplat till integrationer (autentisering, auktorisering, kryptering)


 Som person är du analytisk, strukturerad och har förmåga att se helheten. Du är kommunikativ och pedagogisk, trivs i en samordnande och vägledande roll och kan balansera verksamhetskrav med tekniska och arkitekturella principer. Du har hög integritet i dina arkitekturella ställningstaganden och är trygg i att leda utan formellt personalansvar.
   

  

 Vår kultur genomsyras av våra värderingar – respekt, ansvar, enkelhet och kunskap.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
* Ledarskapsutbildade chefer – samtliga chefer går vårt ledarprogram.
* Karriär- och utvecklingsmöjligheter – vårt mål är att 7 av 10 personer ska kunna internrekryteras till chefs- eller specialistroller.
